'''Search for Lost Spirits''' is a part of the [[Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls]] event.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Search for Lost Spirits 1.png
|text1  = During the "Search for Lost Spirits" challenge, the scattered Roaming Spirits will {{Color|help|stay away from nearby characters}}. Use this to drive the Roaming Spirits away and gather them in the {{Color|help|Spirithub}} to accumulate Spirit Count.<br>When you successfully gather a "Shining Spirit," you will receive more Spirit Count.
|image2 = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Search for Lost Spirits 2.png
|text2  = {{Color|help|Spiritgathering Buffs}} will appear within the area at intervals. Pick them up to increase your Movement SPD or restore Stamina to characters.
|image3 = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Search for Lost Spirits 3.png
|text3  = When a party member receives a {{Color|help|Spiritgathering Buff}}, the party's Spiritcall Value will increase. When the Spiritcall Value reaches the maximum, a Spiritcall Moment will be triggered: For 20s, all characters will {{Color|help|continuously attract}} Roaming Spirits. This effect is useful for bringing Roaming Spirits to Spirithubs.
|image4 = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Search for Lost Spirits 4.png
|text4  = While gathering Roaming Spirits, a golden {{Color|help|Splendiferous Spirithub}} will appear at intervals. Drive the Roaming Spirits into the Splendiferous Spirithub to accumulate double the Spirit Count.
}}

;Shackle Stones
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Search for Lost Spirits Shackle Stones.png
|text1  = When gathering spirits, {{Color|help|Shackle Stones}} will periodically appear. Jumping on a Shackle Stone multiple times will break it and free the Roaming Spirit within.
}}

;Driving Storms
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Search for Lost Spirits Driving Storms.png
|text1  = While gathering spirits, {{Color|help|Driving Storms}} will appear at intervals in the area. Observe the storm's direction and use it to swiftly push Roaming Spirits into the Spirithub and gather them more efficiently.
}}
